posts.post_content:
Old Judge-Related P.H.Mayo &Brother Tobacco Co. Prototype Cabinet Card.
Measures approx. 4 3/16in.X 6 1/2in.. Photo is mounted on heavy backing.
John Doran of the Omaha Club--Western Association.This pose of Doran does not appear in the Old Judge set,even though "Goodwin & Co."is in small print
in the lower right corner,as it would if it was Old Judge.This item probably came out a post--1900 prototype?
Scans sent at your request.
$350.00 check,paypal F&F
---SOLD---
please send me a paypal address to [url]jmanos@columbus.rr.com[/url]
Ben--this was a fantasy item, but I see it found an appropriate home. LOL
